Class PlaceDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.jhu.cs.oose.fall2013.group14.xtraveler.Model.main.PlaceDAO

  • public class PlaceDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is place dao which help the upper layer of the project to query the database, which is related to the table place
    Author:
    kekekeng

      • insertPlace

        public void insertPlace(java.lang.String placeName,
               java.lang.String city,
               java.lang.String state,
               java.lang.String description,
               java.lang.String placeFeature,
               java.lang.String imageURL,
               int star)
        This method is used to insert a place into database
        Parameters:
        placeName - the name of one new place
        city - the city this place belongs to
        state - the state this place belongs to
        description - the description of this place which saved in our database
        placeFeature - the feature of this place
        imageURL - the image of this place
        star - the evaluation of this place
